title: KSRTC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Driver and Conductor Posts
description: Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Driver and Conductor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the KSRTC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection Process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the KSRTC Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the websit...
